name: Jump Loop
description:
Do you have enough ingenuity to escape the shackles of eternal distress?

Welp, you must navigate, with limited jumps, through seemingly repeating rooms, riddled with puzzles and other unfair challenges, for you must attempt to push forward and reach the nexus point...  So as to actually beat the game, one must uncover a loophole.

Controls:

  • Jump: Space
  • Restart: R
  • Quit: T

Music: Don't Die on Me - Myuu
